data.name: VRITRA COMPLETE EDITION - Original Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack of the side scroll shooter "VRITRA COMPLETE EDITION" by Neotro Inc - Fumihito Uekusa (Twitter: @u23).

Track List


01 Akashic Records - Main Theme
02 Hello World - How To
03 Last Sortie - Weapon Select
04 Departure - Stage1
05 Massive Attack - Boss 1
06 Breakthrough - Stage Clear
07 Follow The Wind - Stage2
08 Intellectual Trap - Boss2
09 Psycho Dive - Stage3
10 Shadow Reign - Boss3
11 Parallel Atmosphere - Stage4
12 King Swing - Boss4
13 Blue Bullet Line - Stage5
14 Fear - Boss5
15 Vritra - Boss6
16 Destiny - Last Battle
17 Legend Of Future - Ending
18 Heaven's Rain - Ending
19 Rest In Peace - Game Over
20 Infinite Bloom [Alpha]- Mugen Vritra
21 Infinite Bloom [Beta] - Mugen Vritra
22 Infinite Bloom [Gamma] - Mugen Vritra
23 Zero Fighter Plane - Setsuna Vritra

Information

Available in FLAC 44.1KHz / MP3 320 kbps formats and 22 songs are included.
Also, the music file is installed in "C://ProgramFiles/Steam/steamapps/common/VRITRA COMPLETE EDITION/dlc_content".
